transcript:
Mr. LG
Ee, kajana ombaniru dia
kazirejesha salamu,
zamani kakumbukia.
Ameumizita
kaacha koka, karambaga raza, kaishiwa maskini.
Mpeni taarifa za beti mkwasa
misimkumbuki si, eh, mwambieni, mwambieni mali yake shaliwa. Aha, apunguze kampeni, jimbo lishachukuliwa...
This is a sample transcript for a video file...
